verbs.description: [ARG0: Former Deputy Director of the FBI Andrew McCabe] [V: unveiled] [ARG1: his plans] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [C-ARG1: to sue the Trump administration for “ defamation ” and wrongful termination] ...
